reviewText: I've been to 3 Gaither concerts, they were excellent, I've loved southern gospel music since I was about 5. I've replacing VHS.s to DVDs and I'm glad, with they had DVD,s when I was a kid lol. I gave this 3 stars because the case is cracked broken and looks like crap
Love the Gaither's...Bought this for my Mom & Myself...My son lives in Memphis so it allowed us to enjoy not only the music  but a bonus tour of Memphis ...Nice purchase
Great Item - Love It - Would recommend highly.
I just enjoy these Homecoming videos. They are fun to watch and very inspiring. I have no problem seeing them over and over again. I enjoy using them for my quite time as I relax to heavenly music
Bill Gaither's Homecomings introduced me to Southern Gospel music.  With songs of hope, faith and heaven, you will be blessed. This is one of the best homecomings.

As a huge Bill Gaither fan, I am
very happy with these DVDs and I highly
recommend them to everyone.  So far I
have had great luck ordering from the
vendors and will order again.

I love this video and am so happy to finally have it on DVD. Candy Christmas does an awesome job on "Lord Send Your Angels" (will make just about anyone cry!) and Sandi Patti takes the cake with "My God Is Real!!!" Just an awesome video that will make any Southern Gospel lover want to jump to their feet! They really made this video fun to watch and touching as well. If you love the "Homecoming Videos" you'll definitely want this one in your collection!

This was filmed/recorded at the Orpheum Theatre in Memphis, Tennessee. You get Bill & Gloria Gathier & lots & lots of "homecoming" friends. You get around 120 minutes of good southern gospel music & entertainment. This one includes James Blackwood & Vestal Goodman, along with the rest of the "homecoming" stars. The music is very, very good and very "spiritual". If you like Southern Gospel, you'll love this one.
I really enjoyed the last song - the Hank Williams classic "I saw the Light", the lead singer on this song is Jessy Dixon along with Sandi Patty & some others. It is simply wonderful!!! I highly recommend this one!!!! Thanks, and may God Bless!!!
